page.title: 08TELEVISION VIEWING, CWMBRAN
page.content: {T.V. IN OUR LIVES-}Amazing results were obtained when 10 year-old children calculated their viewing times of T.V.The lowest total for a weeks viewing was 11 hours.The highest was 58 hours.The average was 28.6 hours.In one year this would total 62 days.In 10 years,1 1/2 years viewing. In 60 years this would be about 10 years viewing.The boy who watched 58 hours a week including breakfast,lunch and evening programmes produced even more incredible results.In one year he would watch 125 days a year,in 10 years about 3 1/2 years and in 60 years about 20 1/2 years viewing. Approx. 1/3 of his life was being spent in front of a T.V. set.The results were so frightening he has now cut down on this bad habit.
